description: Describes details about the activation, such as the date and time the activation was created, its expiration date, the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role assigned to the managed nodes in the activation, and the number of nodes registered by using this activation.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: A filter to view information about your activations. (dict) --- Filter for the DescribeActivation API. FilterKey (string) --- The name of the filter. FilterValues (list) --- The filter values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ActivationList
nested_items.description: A list of activations for your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: ActivationId
nested_items.description: The ID created by Systems Manager when you submitted the activation.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A user defined description of the activation.

nested_items.name: DefaultInstanceName
nested_items.description: A name for the managed node when it is created.

nested_items.name: IamRole
nested_items.description: The Identity and Access Management (IAM) role to assign to the managed node.

nested_items.name: RegistrationLimit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of managed nodes that can be registered using this activation.

nested_items.name: RegistrationsCount
nested_items.description: The number of managed nodes already registered with this activation.

nested_items.name: ExpirationDate
nested_items.description: The date when this activation can no longer be used to register managed nodes.

nested_items.name: Expired
nested_items.description: Whether or not the activation is expired.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date the activation was created.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
